summary: This code retrieves an example audio file, separates it into two components using the Spleeter library, and saves the result in the "output" directory. However, it seems to be facing some issues with separation.

details.comment: This code retrieves an example audio file, separates it into two components using the Spleeter library, and saves the result in the "output" directory. However, it seems to be facing some issues with separation.
details.content:
# wget https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/raw/master/audio_example.mp3
# separate the example audio into two components
python3 -m spleeter separate -p spleeter:2stems -o output audio_example.mp3
# seems not working at all
